/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast of nature and architecture. Cars and motorcycles are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is a hazy blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape.
